title: Honoring Trevor Hartblay upon the occasion of his designation for special recognition as the organizer of a New York Blood Center scholarship blood drive
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION honoring Trevor Hartblay upon the occasion of his
designation for special recognition as the organizer of a New York Blood
Center scholarship blood drive

WHEREAS,  It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize that the
quality and character of life in the communities across New  York  State
are  enhanced by the concerned and dedicated efforts of individuals that
generously contribute to the welfare of the community and its citizenry;
and
  WHEREAS, It is also the custom of this Legislative Body to acknowledge
outstanding young people whose personal endeavors and community  service
are an example and inspiration to their colleagues, friends, and family;
and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body  is  justly  proud  to  honor
Trevor  Hartblay upon the occasion of his designation for special recog-
nition as the organizer of a New York  Blood  Center  scholarship  blood
drive; and
  WHEREAS,  Trevor Hartblay is a senior at Schreiber High School in Port
Washington, New York; and
  WHEREAS, Knowing that the New York Blood Center needs 2,000  donors  a
day  to  support its vital services to the Long Island community, Trevor
Hartblay organized a scholarship blood  drive  at  the  Port  Washington
Public Library, which was held on Thursday, January 13, 2011; and
  WHEREAS, The New York Blood Center scholarship blood drive is a way to
save  lives  and  to  raise  money  for  young donors who plan to attend
college; it enables participating youth to give back  to  the  community
while raising money for their further education; and
  WHEREAS,  Trevor Hartblay donates blood every time there is a drive at
his school; he plans to attend college and study history  next  fall  at
either Binghamton University or the University of New Haven; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is  the  sense  of this Legislative Body that when young
people of such noble aims and accomplishments are brought to our  atten-
tion, they should be recognized by all the citizens of this great Empire
State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
honor Trevor Hartblay upon the occasion of his designation  for  special
recognition  as  the  organizer  of  a New York Blood Center scholarship
blood drive; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Trevor Hartblay, Port Washington, New York.
